TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaEnumerationFacet extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaFacet

Docs.summary: Represents the facet from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C). This class specifies a list of valid values for a simpleType element. Declaration is contained within a declaration.
